Text: Sorry forgot to post in the description that you don't need a disk you can go out and search for PowerISO on Pirate-bay and download that and just mount the disk image to your virtual drive. For any more questions please contact me at my email, andrewhill2020@yahoo.com

I am not sure if you are serious or just saying that, but contacting you via e-mail about stolen content is like entering a courtroom and promising that you did in fact steal the content.

Sounds like a trap, smells like one too. Die in a fire.

Please accept my apologies if this in not the case and you are just having a moment of idiocy.
@OmniNegro I was probably having a moment of idiocy. Sorry.
